descriptionHTML:
This completely customizable interactive HD Android Wear Watch Face brings a classic elegance to your wrist. Features include battery levels, weather conditions, Google Fit step counter, color picker & date information. A settings app will also be installed on your mobile device to configure the watch face for any look you desire. Select any color and create a completely custom look for yourself!


💡IMPORTANT - Not compatible with Samsung Smart Watches that use Tizen or smartwatches with other operating systems than Android Wear. Please also note that as this is an HD watch face, the file is a bit larger and can take up to 5 minutes to transfer to your watch. This is normal.

★Basic Features★
✔ Interactive Actions (Digital)
✔ Customizable digital & or analog clock
✔ Custom date format picker
✔ Smooth second hand
✔ Screen Modes (Normal, Always Ambient, Always On)
✔ Screen on Time selection
✔ 24-Hour (in phone’s date & time settings)
✔ Burn-In protection

★Premium Features★
✔ Interactive Actions (Date, Weather, Step Counter)
✔ Color picker to select any color you like for the background, clock hands, text, & numbers
✔ Save personal color themes (long press to delete theme)
✔ Clock numbers toggle
✔ Watch battery status
✔ Phone battery status
✔ Current date
✔ Google Fit Step Counter
✔ Weather conditions (Yahoo Weather & OpenWeatherMap)

★Translations★
✔ English
✔ Chinese
✔ Czech
✔ French
✔ German
✔ Italian
✔ Japanese
✔ Korean
✔ Russian
✔ Spanish

★How to install★
Once you have installed from the Play store, you may be asked to grant permissions to the app on your phone - be sure to approve all permissions. Once the app has installed on your phone, it may take 5-10 minutes to transfer over to you watch and the Android Wear app. Please be patient. Once installed, simply long press on your watch face to bring up the selection menu, or select this watch face from the Android Wear app. Use the accompanying settings app to configure the settings and options

If you have any problems at all, please send me an email before leaving a negative review - I will do my best to fix the issue as soon as possible.

★Trouble Shooting★
http://goo.gl/MXpdWw

This watch face has been tested and working on: Huawei Watch, Moto 360, LG G Watch R, LG Watch Urbane 2nd Edition, Sony SmartWatch 3

Stay tuned for more watch faces to come!

★Google+ Community★
https://goo.gl/IF2OX9
comments: One of the best This face looks very classy, operates well, and is customizable.
Great looking watch face and very good and quick support from the dev !
